lead_paragraph: Today's idea: Once content with sending musicians and comedians southward, Canada has moved in on cult-film territory with the "Canuxploitation" flick.
snippet: Friday | Today's idea: Once content with sending musicians and comedians southward, Canada has moved in on cult-film territory with the "Canuxploitation" flick. [Maisonneuve]
